markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Turkek](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1784) **Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 39 **Perception** +12; bloodsense (imprecise) 30 feet, [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13 **Str** +3 **Dex** +2 **Con** +2 **Int** +4 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +1 **Items** spellbook with all prepared spells, [wand of widening](/Equipment.aspx?ID=373) (2nd-level [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59)) --- **AC** 23 **Fort** +16 **Ref** +16 **Will** +14 +2 circumstance to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) **HP** 100 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Sanguine Aura** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 30 feet. Around Turkek, wounds heal slowly and blood flows faster. The flat check to stop [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) is DC 16, rather than DC 15. In addition, each time a creature in the emanation takes persistent bleed damage, it takes 1d6 additional bleed damage.
**Clot** **Trigger** Turkek takes persistent bleed damage **Effect** Turkek's blood hardens, sealing her wounds. Turkek automatically passes her next flat check to recover from the triggering [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** fangs +16 ([Grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d6+5 piercing plus 1d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 25, attack +17 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Mage Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=176), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2) - **2nd** [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299) - **3rd** [Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=22), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141) (×2) - **4th** [Blood Vendetta](/Spells.aspx?ID=675), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Sanguine Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=989) **Blood Let** **Requirements** Turkek's last action was a fang Strike that hit the target; **Effect** Turkek rips her fangs across one of the target's arteries or veins, dealing an additional 1d6+5 slashing damage. **Siphon Blood** **Requirements** A creature within Turkek's sanguine aura is taking [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); **Effect** Turkek draws her enemy's blood into her own body to heal her wounds. She regains 7 Hit Points.
name: Turkek

Around Turkek, wounds heal slowly and blood flows faster. The flat check to stop persistent bleed damage is DC 16, rather than DC 15. In addition, each time a creature in the emanation takes persistent bleed damage, it takes 1d6 additional bleed damage. Clot Reaction Trigger Turkek takes persistent bleed damage Effect Turkek's blood hardens, sealing her wounds. Turkek automatically passes her next flat check to recover from the triggering persistent bleed damage. --- Speed 25 feet Melee fangs +16 (Grapple, Unarmed), Damage 1d6+5 piercing plus 1d6 persistent bleed Arcane Prepared Spells DC 25, attack +17 - Cantrips (4th) Detect Magic, Ghost Sound, Mage Hand, Shield, Telekinetic Projectile - 1st Grim Tendrils, Mage Armor, Ray of Enfeeblement (×2) - 2nd False Life, Invisibility, Spider Climb - 3rd Bind Undead, Grim Tendrils (×2) - 4th Blood Vendetta, Grim Tendrils, Sanguine Mist Blood Let Single Action Requirements Turkek's last action was a fang Strike that hit the target; Effect Turkek rips her fangs across one of the target's arteries or veins, dealing an additional 1d6+5 slashing damage. Siphon Blood Two Actions Requirements A creature within Turkek's sanguine aura is taking persistent bleed damage; Effect Turkek draws her enemy's blood into her own body to heal her wounds. She regains 7 Hit Points.
